Html:
Hi, I am using "CommittingEdit" event for validations for all of my dataGrid, but as I installed the V1 and I can't fine "CommittingEdit" event.
Is it intentionally removed or what? Why? Any alternative solution? ASAP.

Thanks.
The API has been updated to CellEditEnding and RowEditEnding.  This is to let you know what type of commit is occurring.  Before CommittingEdit was called for both which was a little confusing.
